data.text:
Pooja Sharma is a transgender of Mumbai. Pooja Sharma ‘The Rekha’, transgender celebrity of 7:45 Mumbai Local Amid the gardi of Mumbai local, a vibrant face has evolved with massive fame popularity.

Dressed in silks saree and adorned with many ornaments, a transgender from the Kinnar community’s, Pooja Sharma been very successful in attracting eyes from all directions. While she enters the local train to entertain passengers with her song in return for the aid of only ₹01.

It is her cool style and glam outfits that enthrall everyone who saw her. she referred to as the Bollywood diva ‘The Rekha ‘Bollywood actress, she captivates everyone through her elegant saree’s and accessories. As a member of the Kinnar community, she started her journey by performing’Mangti’ in the 7:45 ladies’ special Mumbai local.

After she started posting photos and videos on instagram and later on MX taka tak, her charming looks and graceful singing and dancing won the hearts of people. With over 238k followers on Instagram, she gains attention in a quick time.
